body.gatha1: Hīnaṃ dhammaṃ na seveyya, pamādena na saṃvase;
body.gathalast: Micchādiṭṭhiṃ na seveyya, na siyā lokavaḍḍhano.
Dhammacārī sukhaṃ seti, asmiṃ loke paramhi ca.
body.gatha1: Dhammaṃ care sucaritaṃ, na naṃ duccaritaṃ care;
body.gathalast: Dhammacārī sukhaṃ seti, asmiṃ loke paramhi ca.
Evaṃ lokaṃ avekkhantaṃ, maccurājā na passati.
Yattha bālā visīdanti, natthi saṅgo vijānataṃ.
body.gatha1: Yo ca pubbe pamajjitvā, pacchā so nappamajjati;
body.gathalast: Somaṃ lokaṃ pabhāseti, abbhā muttova candimā.
Somaṃ lokaṃ pabhāseti, abbhā muttova candimā.
body.gatha1: Na ve kadariyā devalokaṃ vajanti, bālā have nappasaṃsanti dānaṃ;
body.gathalast: Dhīro ca dānaṃ anumodamāno, teneva so hoti sukhī parattha.
